title: Loss of control of character ingame.
body:
Basicaly it's like im getting high ping (at stable 43ms) at certain points, my character wont move and i cant use spells/items, but I can still chat and watch my team and enemies run around normaly.

Always on 144fps with no drops and stable 43ms. Tried restarting my pc and shutting off all my programs running in the back but nothing works.

PC speccs:
i7-6700k @4.6ghz
GTX 980ti Strixx gaming OC
16gb 2666mhz ram
750w Power supply

replies.body:
It certainly sounds like you're experiencing *Packet Loss* or high buffering, based on the description of your symptoms. These issues are normally caused by certain conflicting network settings you may be running if it doesn't end up being a network routing problem. As a quick check, we can see if there were issues with your local configurations by having you work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to configure your settings for League.

Let me know if this caused any sort of change for you.
